text: Rochester railway station is a railway station in Rochester in Kent. The station is on the Chatham Main Line. ==Services== Train services at Rochester are run by Southeastern and Thameslink, They use , , , and EMUs. The off-peak service is: * 2 trains per hour to London St Pancras International * 3 trains per hour to (2 of these run non-stop from and 1 runs via ) * 2 trains per hour to via and * 1 train per hour to * 2 trains per hour to * 1 train per hour to * 1 train per hour to via * 2 trains per hour to Some trains go to and from London Charing Cross via , Some trains run as "fast trains" and they go to and from London Cannon Street at peak hours. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Medway
title: Rochester railway station
